Reviews.Title: “Overpriced.”
Reviews.Author: BrusselStardancer
Reviews.Content: title surprise travelers 210 € night normal 4 star paris except banner wall star 3 reception makes feel near railway station hotel clean personnel helpful scary elevator brings floor reach aisle superior ok morning breakfast basement paris choices money

Reviews.Title: “A nice 3* hotel all in all”
Reviews.Author: AnastasijaA2
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel short trip paris beginning hotel outside little bit scared feeling following reception beautiful clean wish romantic trip paris view balconies beautiful parisien magic breakfast little bit disappointing experiences paris foodbut time lot choice waitresses couldnt minus hotel definitely 15minutes metro walking day parisyou die coming hotel

Reviews.Title: “mixed feelings....”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a hotelsgrandparis.com traveler
Reviews.Content: booked nov 2010 discovered january 2011 changed ownership notifying lengthy agreement arrangements november free bottled water perks initially included deal supplied disappointing reception staff except friendly lady kenya bother recognize guests
